name: AI Dashboard React UI — Fix Build Pipeline and Deploy
description: Fix broken deployment pipeline for the React AI Dashboard. Source code is complete and correct; deployment is broken because vite.config.js has base: '/' instead of base: '/dashboards/ai/', and there is no GitHub Actions deploy workflow. This feature fixes the vite base path and creates the deploy workflow.
requirements: Fix ai/vite.config.js: change base from '/' to '/dashboards/ai/' (required for correct asset paths when served from subdirectory)
Deploy workflow: destination_dir: ai, keep_files: true (preserves other gh-pages content)
Deploy workflow triggers: push to ai/** AND workflow_run on "Update AI Dashboard Data" completion
Source lives at ai/ in Seven-Fortunas/dashboards repo
acceptance_criteria: vite.config.js has base: '/dashboards/ai/' confirmed via grep
.github/workflows/deploy-ai-dashboard.yml committed with peaceiris action, destination_dir: ai, keep_files: true, workflow_run trigger
GitHub Actions workflow completes with conclusion: success (T3)
JS bundle loads (not 404) — URL extracted from live index.html, verified 200 (T4)

functional: T1: grep -q "base: '/dashboards/ai/'" ai/vite.config.js && echo "PASS T1.1: vite base correct"
T1: test -f .github/workflows/deploy-ai-dashboard.yml && echo "PASS T1.2: deploy workflow exists"
T1: grep -q "destination_dir: ai" .github/workflows/deploy-ai-dashboard.yml && echo "PASS T1.3"
T1: grep -q "workflow_run" .github/workflows/deploy-ai-dashboard.yml && echo "PASS T1.4"
T2: gh api repos/Seven-Fortunas/dashboards/contents/ai/vite.config.js | jq -r '.content' | base64 -d | grep -q "/dashboards/ai/" && echo "PASS T2.1"
T2: gh api repos/Seven-Fortunas/dashboards/contents/.github/workflows/deploy-ai-dashboard.yml | jq '.name' && echo "PASS T2.2"

T3: Poll: gh run list --repo Seven-Fortunas/dashboards --workflow deploy-ai-dashboard.yml --limit 1 --json status,conclusion | jq -r '.[0]|"\(.status):\(.conclusion)"' until "completed:success" (max 20x30s)
T4: curl -sf -o /tmp/ai_idx.html https://seven-fortunas.github.io/dashboards/ai/ && echo "PASS T4.1: HTML 200"

T4: JS_PATH=$(grep -o 'src="/dashboards/ai/assets/[^"]*\.js"' /tmp/ai_idx.html | head -1 | sed 's/src="//;s/"//'); curl -sf "https://seven-fortunas.github.io${JS_PATH}" -o /dev/null && echo "PASS T4.2: JS loads"

T4: CSS_PATH=$(grep -o 'href="/dashboards/ai/assets/[^"]*\.css"' /tmp/ai_idx.html | head -1 | sed 's/href="//;s/"//'); curl -sf "https://seven-fortunas.github.io${CSS_PATH}" -o /dev/null && echo "PASS T4.3: CSS loads"
T4: curl -sf https://seven-fortunas.github.io/dashboards/ai/data/cached_updates.json | jq '.updates | length' (expect 14+) && echo "PASS T4.4: data loads"
technical: cd ai && npm ci && npm run build succeeds locally
grep -q '/dashboards/ai/assets/' ai/dist/index.html (built output has correct paths)
grep -q '"react": "^18' ai/package.json
integration: workflow_run trigger connects data update pipeline to dashboard rebuild
keep_files: true preserves other gh-pages content (data/, fintech/, etc.)

constraints: MUST NOT mark pass until T4 complete — HTML 200 alone is insufficient (React never boots if JS 404s). Per NFR-4.4.
